title: A projection of maximum 30 cm
clause_text: A projection of maximum 30 cm. on roof top terrace level may be allowed through out the periphery of the building. In case of pitched roof projection of maximum 45 cm. at rooftop level throughout periphery of the building shall be allowed.
section: Buildings Abutting Two or More Streets

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
